events.message: We have received a new application from a candidate interested in the software engineer position to join our development team.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to keywords such as software developer and devops experience listed in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to proceed with the candidate's evaluation and next steps.
Initial phone screening was completed successfully, covering the candidate's software engineering experience and familiarity with devops tools.
The candidate responded promptly and positively, expressing enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview and aligning career goals with our projects.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week with the engineering panel to evaluate coding skills and system design capabilities.
